==Trivia==
*The Chinese name for Qiqi's Normal Attack, [[Ancient Sword Art]], is {{Lang|''Ancient Yunlai Swordsmanship''|zh=云来古剑法|zh_rm=Yúnlái Gǔ Jiànfǎ}}.
**This parallel was kept in the Japanese, Korean, French, German, and Vietnamese localizations.
